meanings.definition: A plant or animal with many feet or legs.
meanings.sent1: The polypods scurried across the forest floor.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of polypods crawling on the rocks.
meanings.sent3: The polypods decided to have a race to see who was the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The polypods moved in unison, resembling a wave of motion.
meanings.sent5: The polypods' numerous legs made them look like a moving carpet.

meanings.definition: A type of fern with many leaves on each stem.
meanings.sent1: The polypods in the garden had vibrant green leaves.
meanings.sent2: I love how the polypods sway gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent3: The polypods whispered secrets to each other in the moonlight.
meanings.sent4: The polypods' leaves intertwined like a beautiful dance.
meanings.sent5: The polypods' foliage created a lush and dense canopy.
